description.value:
Clock faces and gears adorn the twisted iron shaft of a chronomancer staff, the hands of the clocks continually ticking or winding backward. Used as a weapon, the staff is a +2 greater striking speed staff. While wielding this staff, you also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to initiative rolls.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.BvNbDwFYaidKJG9j]{Time Sense}
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rerNA6YZsdxuJYt3]{Déjà Vu}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.DgcSiOCR1uDXGaEA]{Synchronize}
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mLAYvbafVKfBgEhz]{Loose Time's Arrow}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.DgcSiOCR1uDXGaEA]{Synchronize}
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Llx0xKvtu8S4z6TI]{Day's Weight}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.o6YCGx4lycsYpww4]{Haste}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.WsUwpfmhKrKwoIe3]{Slow}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.qJGW6BbIcU6sfA1d]{Time Jump}
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.B3eLlbaPxOYHcs1o]{Curse Of Lost Time}
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.lETZeqBPoj2htGVk]{Quicken Time}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5tpk4Q2QI3FVhm99]{Rewinding Step}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.3E1p58MNQMO4GAxt]{Stagnate Time}
  • 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.OdqM06M0wDUqZWiR]{Cast into Time}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Llx0xKvtu8S4z6TI]{Day's Weight}
  • 7th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.G56DJkxlUjFv0C4Z]{Time Beacon}

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
